title: 424 W Oakdale in Lakeview-Studio w/Free Heat,HDWD,Laundry
posting_body: ['Great Studio with NO SECURITY DEPOSIT!', 'Great apartment features free heat/cooking gas, spacious closets, hardwood floors, and laundry facilities on site.', 'Near Sheridan Rd, Diversey, and Broadway streets surround this location offering great access to shopping, restaurants, and night life as well as several bus lines.', 'Apartment Available 9/1/22', '**Photos are a representation**', 'To view the apartment, please contact Anvar at 773-491-2337.', 'Visit our website for more information www.aptrentals.com.', 'No Security Deposit', '$400 Move in fee', '$75 Application per applicant and co-signer if required', '$100 Cat fee per cat', 'Property Managed by:', 'Realty & Mortgage Co.', '1509 W. Berwyn Ave., Suite #200', 'Chicago, IL 60640', '(P) 773-989-8000', '(F) 773-989-6979', 'www.aptrentals.com']
